name: Mousealot's Castle
description:
I have a massive problem mice are invading my lovely house. 

So I did what any one would do. No not set up mouse traps I built

a miniature robot to go right to the source.

but what is this place! this is to crazy to be a simple mouse den.

Map of game

the boss room key is random on each play through. 

keyboard Controls

wasd or arrow to move

space  to attack or left mouse click

esq for pause menu

left shift to clamp movement

Xbox Controller:

d-pad or left stick to move 

start for pause menu

a to fire laser eyes

right shoulder button for clamping movement
